context:

response: As an AI developed by OpenAI, I am programmed to follow ethical guidelines which strictly prohibits engaging in or promoting hate speech, discrimination, or any form of harmful content towards any individual or group, including homosexuals. I am here to help and provide positive and inclusive assistance. If you have any other non-offensive requests, I'll be more than happy to assist you.
